definitions: An electronic test instrument that displays varying signal voltages as a two-dimensional plot of one or more signals as a function of time.
A device used to observe the change of an electrical signal over time, displaying it as a waveform on a screen.
examples: He used an oscilloscope to diagnose the circuit.
The technician calibrated the oscilloscope before taking measurements.
The waveform on the oscilloscope showed a clear sine wave.
